name: Bad Commute
description:
It's been a long day, but you're almost at your stop.  Get off the train and go home.

Controls:

  • WASD - Move
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left Click - Interact
  • Right Click - View Ticket

Created for Ludum Dare 47 during October 2020
Made by Andrew Facchiano and Alec Asperslag

Theme: Stuck in a loop
